description.narrative: To support GRAIN's work in promoting a better understanding of the central role that food systems play in combating climate change, and mobilizing local partners to articulate positions and strategies on this issue through information sharing and networking. This grant will fund the production of three reports and other materials that show how the fight against climate change must include a reorientation of the global food system; supporting the efforts of small farmers movements to make their voice heard by providing them with resources and increased capacity; possibly producing short videos and other multimedia formats; and participating in various networking events hosted by local partners in Africa, Asia, and Latin America
